name: tabpreloader
description: Reloads neighboring tabs of currently active tab if they are pending to be reloaded after a restart.
author: jmozmoz

preferences.name: leftOffset
preferences.title: Left offset
preferences.description: Number of tabs to be preloaded left to the current tab.

preferences.name: rightOffset
preferences.title: Right offset
preferences.description: Number of tabs to be preloaded right to the current tab.
